text: * The Qur'an (القرآن الكريم): The central religious text of Islam, which Muslims believe to be the word of God as revealed to Muhammad. * Tafsir (تفسير): Commentaries and interpretations of the Quranic verses. Some famous tafsir include: ** Tafsir al-JalalaynTafsir Ibn Kathir ** Tafsir al-Qurtubi * Seerah (السيرة النبوية): Biographies of Muhammad. One of the most famous is "Ar-Raheeq Al-Makhtum" (The Sealed Nectar). * Fiqh (الفقه): Islamic jurisprudence or the understanding of Islamic law. Some major schools of thought include: ** Hanafi ** Maliki ** Shafi'i ** Hanbali * Hadith Qudsi (الحديث القدسي): Sacred sayings of Muhammad in which he relates the words of Allah. *
title: List of Islamic texts
